title: SurfaceCurvature
description: The Shape Operator for Differential Analysis of Images. It can operate on binary or gray scale images with various modes to see different effects.

filename_in.title: Input Image
filename_in.description: The input image file in .nii format.

filename_out.title: Output Image
filename_out.description: The output image file in .nii format.

option.title: Operation Option
option.description: The operation mode: 0 for mean curvature, 5 for surface characterization, 6 for Gaussian curvature, and 7 for surface area.
